title: Memory-enhanced noiseless cross-phase modulation
title_cn: 存储器增强型无噪声交叉相位调制
abstract: Large nonlinearity at the single-photon level can pave the way for the implementation of universal quantum gates. However, realizing large and noiseless nonlinearity at such low light levels has been a great challenge for scientists in the past decade. Here, we propose a scheme that enables substantial nonlinear interaction between two light fields that are both stored in an atomic memory. Semiclassical and quantum simulations demonstrate the feasibility of achieving large cross-phase modulation (XPM) down to the single-photon level. The proposed scheme can be used to implement parity gates from which CNOT gates can be constructed. Furthermore, we present a proof of principle experimental demonstration of XPM between two optical pulses: one stored and one freely propagating through the memory medium.
abstract_cn: 单光子级的大非线性可以为实现通用量子门铺平道路。 然而，在过去的十年中，在如此低的光照水平下实现大且无噪声的非线性一直是科学家的巨大挑战。 在这里，我们提出了一种方案，该方案能够使两个都存储在原子存储器中的光场之间发生实质性的非线性相互作用。 半经典和量子仿真证明了实现低至单光子级的大交叉相位调制（XPM）的可行性。 所提出的方案可用于实现可从其构造CNOT门的奇偶门。 此外，我们提供了XPM在两个光脉冲之间的原理实验证明：一个被存储，一个在存储介质中自由传播。

title: Ellipsometric determination of permittivity in a negative index photonic crystal metamaterial
title_cn: 椭圆光度法测定负折射率光子晶体超材料中的介电常数
abstract: In this work, we present the first experimental evidence of negative dielectric susceptibility in a two-dimensional silicon photonic crystal (PhC) with negative refractive index behavior. In the frequency range in which the effective refractive index neff is equal to −1, the incident light couples efficiently to the guided modes in the top surface layer of the PhC metamaterial. These modes resemble surface plasmon polariton resonances. This finding was confirmed by ellipsometric measurements, demonstrating the isotropy of the PhC resonances. Such negative index PhC materials may be of use in biosensing applications.
abstract_cn: 在这项工作中，我们提供了具有负折射率行为的二维硅光子晶体（PhC）中负电介质磁化率的第一个实验证据。 在有效折射率n eff 等于＆＃8722; 1的频率范围内，入射光有效地耦合到PhC超材料的上表面层中的引导模式。 这些模式类似于表面等离子激元共振。 椭偏测量证实了这一发现，证明了PhC共振的各向同性。 这种负指数的PhC材料可能在生物传感应用中使用。
